official_title: A bill to amend the Alaska National Interest Lands Conservation Act to provide for monetary compensation to professional registered guides in Alaska for loss of income resulting from restrictions on hunting, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Alaska National Interest Lands Conservation Act to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to compensate eligible licensed guides for income lost because of hunting restrictions imposed under such Act. Establishes in the Treasury a Sport Hunting Guide Compensation Account to provide such compensation. Authorizes appropriations to the Account.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Alaska National Interest Lands Conservation Act to provide for monetary compensation to professional registered guides in Alaska for loss of income resulting from restrictions on hunting, and for other purposes.
